metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17175 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: In the marshmallow library before 2.15.1 and 3.x before 3.0.0b9 for Python,the schema "only" option treats an empty list as implying no "only" option,which allows a request that was intended to expose no fields to insteadexpose all fields (if the schema is being filtered dynamically using the"only" option, and there is a user role that produces an empty value for"only").

criterions.comment: python-marshmallow package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
